register.title: App registration
register.subtitle: Register the Homey app in your car
register.text1: Register the Homey app in your car to allow the app to send commands to your car.
register.text2: Use the registration button to start registering in the Tesla app. If the link opens in the browser, then follow the 'Open in Tesla App' hint.
register.text3: This registration is necessary to use the 'Tesla Vehicle Commands Protocol' and the end-to-end encryption of commands sent to the vehicle.
register.text4: Pre-2021 models S/X are excluded. These can still be controlled via the REST API. Please select the command API in the device settings.
register.text5: This registration can be repeated via the 'Repair Device' dialog.

car.trunk_not_allowed: Trunk operation disabled in device settings
car.app_not_registered: App is not registered in the car. Register via car device repair process.
car.command_error_426: App update required. Please update the app in the Homey app store or enable automatic updates.

update.update_message: The next version of Tesla app addes a new permission (Homey location). Auto update is not working in this case. Please check for updates manually next days and install the next version from app store.
